heisig_chinese_memo: Spidey ditches the old school thread slinging and uses a car with missiles and a mountain hideout like Batman. When he saves people, they hop in the car and he tells them to fasten the seatbelt tight.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey ditches the old school thread slinging and uses a car with missiles and a mountain hideout like Batman. When he saves people, they hop in the car and he tells them to fasten the seatbelt tight.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸", "毄" sound, the original meaning is bondage. "Said Wen": "Department 𦃇 also. One said: Evil flocculation. From 糸, 毄声." " Department " means bondage is found in "Book of Rites-Ritual Instruments": "March system, 7-day precept, 3rd night, Be cautious." Zheng Xuan's note: "Yes.

" Relationship " can further mean detention. The Book of Rites-Yueling Order: "(Meng Xiazhiyue) Severe punishment, convict minor crimes, and commit light ties."

" Department " also means hanging. "Xunzi ‧ Encouraging Learning": "(Mengjiu) takes feathers as a nest, and weaves it for hair, tied to reed vetch."

" Department " is also used as a reminder. Tang Rongyu (Title Yan's Bamboo Pavilion): "The shelter of Ziling is a savage heart."

" Department " also means continuous. "Zhou Li‧Tian Guan‧Da Zai": "The people of the two nations are based on nine." Zheng Xuan's note: "Relationship, link together."

" Department " put together by the sense of can be extended to involve the relationship. Han Zhang Heng's "Xijing Fu": "Where there is fertile soil, it is easy, and when it is barren soil, it is labor. This is also the one who cares about the earth."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸", "毄" sound, the original meaning is bondage.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「毄」聲，本義為拴縛。《說文》：「繫𦃇也。一曰：惡絮。从糸，毄聲。」「繫」表示栓縛見於《禮記‧禮器》：「三月繫，七日戒，三日宿，慎之至也。」鄭玄注：「繫，繫牲於牢也。」

　　「繫」可進一步表示拘禁，《禮記‧月令》：「（孟夏之月）斷薄刑，決小罪，出輕繫。」

　　「繫」也表示懸掛。《荀子‧勸學》：「（蒙鳩）以羽為巢，而編之以髮，繫之葦苕。」

　　「繫」亦用作掛念。唐戎昱〈題嚴氏竹亭〉：「子陵棲遁處，堪繫野人心。」

　　「繫」還表示連綴。《周禮‧天官‧大宰》：「以九兩繫邦國之民。」鄭玄注：「繫，聯綴也。」

　　「繫」由連綴之義可引申為涉及、關係。漢張衡〈西京賦〉：「處沃土則逸，處瘠土則勞，此繫乎地者也。」

從「 糸 」，「 毄 」聲，本義為拴縛。《說文》：「繫𦃇也。一曰：惡絮。从糸，毄聲。」「 繫 」表示栓縛見於《禮記‧禮器》：「三月繫，七日戒，三日宿，慎之至也。」鄭玄注：「繫，繫牲於牢也。」 「 繫 」可進一步表示拘禁，《禮記‧月令》：「（孟夏之月）斷薄刑，決小罪，出輕繫。」 「 繫 」也表示懸掛。《荀子‧勸學》：「（蒙鳩）以羽為巢，而編之以髮，繫之葦苕。」 「 繫 」亦用作掛念。唐戎昱〈題嚴氏竹亭〉：「子陵棲遁處，堪繫野人心。」 「 繫 」還表示連綴。《周禮‧天官‧大宰》：「以九兩繫邦國之民。」鄭玄注：「繫，聯綴也。」 「 繫 」由連綴之義可引申為涉及、關係。漢張衡〈西京賦〉：「處沃土則逸，處瘠土則勞，此繫乎地者也。」
From " 糸", " 毄" sound, the original meaning is bondage. "Said Wen": "Department 𦃇 also. One said: Evil flocculation. From 糸, 毄声." " Department" means bondage is found in "Book of Rites-Ritual Instruments": "March system, 7-day precept, 3rd night, Be cautious." Zheng Xuan's note: "Yes. " Relationship" can further mean detention. The Book of Rites-Yueling Order: "(Meng Xiazhiyue) Severe punishment, convict minor crimes, and commit light ties." " Department" also means hanging. "Xunzi ‧ Encouraging Learning": "(Mengjiu) takes feathers as a nest, and weaves it for hair, tied to reed vetch." " Department" is also used as a reminder. Tang Rongyu (Title Yan's Bamboo Pavilion): "The shelter of Ziling is a savage heart." " Department" also means continuous. "Zhou Li‧Tian Guan‧Da Zai": "The people of the two nations are based on nine." Zheng Xuan's note: "Relationship, link together." " Department" put together by the sense of can be extended to involve the relationship. Han Zhang Heng's "Xijing Fu": "Where there is fertile soil, it is easy, and when it is barren soil, it is labor. This is also the one who cares about the earth."

繫字的基本解释

繫
xì
见“系1”③④⑤⑦。

繫
jì
见“系2”。

繫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》胡計切，去霽，匣。］
［《廣韻》古詣切，去霽，見。］
“傒2”的被通假字。亦作“縘1”。“繋1”的今字。“系4”的繁体字。
(1)拴缚。
(2)引申为挂念，牵记。
(3)悬挂。
(4)拘囚；拘禁。
(5)联缀；归属。
(6)涉及；关系。
(7)世系，系統。
(8)粗丝带子。
(9)通“擊”。参见“繫戾”。
[②]［jì］
“2”的今字。亦作“縘2”。“系2”的繁体字。
打结；扣上。

繫字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繫； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页940第07
【廣韻】古詣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】吉詣切，?音計。【說文】繫，?也。一曰惡絮。【玉篇】約束也，留滯也。【類篇】一曰維也。　又【集韻】牽奚切，音溪。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?胡計切，音系。【易·繫辭疏】繫辭者，聖人繫屬此辭于卦爻之下。又云：系辭者，取綱系之義也。【釋文】繫，本系也。又續也。【周禮·天官·大宰】以九兩繫邦國之民。【註】繫，聯綴也。【干祿字書】繫通繫。【集韻】系或作繫。【類篇】或作?。
